izzy.classification.ks¶

izzy.classification.ks(y_true, y_prob, sample_weights=None)[source]¶

Compute the Kolmogorov-Smirnov (KS) test statistic to evaluate model performance

Parameters

  • y_true (ArrayLike) – True y values

  • y_prob (ArrayLike) – Predicted y values (expressed as a probability when target outcome is true)

  • sample_weights –

Returns

KS statistic

Return type

float

See also

https()
